attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a free nation have the right to view  most things on the internet. Why follow in the French way of a 3 strikes and your off the net policy for file sharers and restrict internet access. You wouldn't buy an album if you didn't like most of it so being able to download it and listen to it before buying it brings advantage to the consumer and the artist.
